mapper.insert: insert into v_video (author_id, zone_id, img_Url, video_title, video_brief, video_status) values (#{author_id}, #{zone_id}, #{img_Url}, #{video_title}, #{video_brief}, #{video_status})
mapper.select: select v.id, v.author_id, u.user_name, v.video_title, v.video_brief, v.gmt_create, d.play_nub, d.video_pnumb, d.video_coin, d.like_number, d.down_number, v.zone_id, v.video_status, i.video_location from v_video v left join u_user u on u.id = v.author_id left join v_video_data d on d.id = v.id left join v_video_item i on i.id = v.id WHERE v.id = #{id}
